The broadcast in the preliminaries and the PPV had quite a few glitches. The prelims were worse. I was watching them live and the audio was just horrid. There were lots of microphone issues, and the occasional skip in the video. They seemed to fix most of it by the time the PPV came around, but the mic problem struck again when Bruce was announcing the main event. His voice vanished. lol. Audio tech team screwed up big. And any video glitches were courtesy of UFC on Xbox Live. I am never ordering from Xbox Live again. This was my first time trying their stream. Not happy that it's the same price as the local PPV price and is lesser quality.
